name: Insect Slaughter
description:
A game made in 24 hours for Ludum Dare. 

You are Ursal.

One of the greatest wizzards in the world.

Your name is known by every living creature as the one who can solve all problems.

And right now the one who needs your help is non other then Count Dracula.

After beeing away for a few decades ruling over a distant nation, he has now come home to find his castle overtaken by discusting insectoids.

You task is to eliminate all creatures as they come by.

Leave a comment if you like the game!!
